첫 번 째 후보군: don’t let the darkness touch you!
두 번 째 후보군: You must never touch the darkness!

첫 번 째 후보군: please follow the knights and evacuate.
두 번 째 후보군: Please follow the knight and evacuate.

첫 번 째 후보군: knights, make sure to protect the saint!
두 번 째 후보군: Knights, ensure the saint's safe escort!

첫 번 째 후보군: then I’ll be on my way--

원문: 영애, 어둠이 다가오는 쪽으로 돌아갈 생각이신가요?
첫 번 째 후보군: my lady, are you going back toward the darkness?
두 번 째 후보군: My lady, are you thinking of going back toward the darkness?

원문: 본부에 아직 남아 있는 사람이 있을지도 모르니까요.
첫 번 째 후보군: there may still be people left at the base.
두 번 째 후보군: There may still be people left at the headquarters.

첫 번 째 후보군: I’ll be back soon, so don’t worry--
두 번 째 후보군: I’ll be back soon, so don’t worry.

첫 번 째 후보군: something is trying to kill you!
두 번 째 후보군: Something is trying to kill you, my lady!

첫 번 째 후보군: my partner is trapped inside the base!
두 번 째 후보군: A comrade is trapped inside the headquarters!

첫 번 째 후보군: thank you for saving me, magician!
두 번 째 후보군: I owe you my life, magician!

원문: 어둠과 마수가 몰려와서 꼼짝없이 죽는 줄로만 알았어요!
첫 번 째 후보군: I thought I was going to die when the darkness and demons came!
두 번 째 후보군: I thought I was doomed when the darkness and monsters swarmed in!
If you're going to thank someone, thank Gunter!

첫 번 째 후보군: he followed me to this dangerous place.
두 번 째 후보군: He even came along to this dangerous place.

원문: 그보다, 정말 이제 남은 사람은 없는 거죠?
첫 번 째 후보군: by the way, are you sure there’s no one left?
두 번 째 후보군: More importantly, are you sure there's no one left?

첫 번 째 후보군: now we just have to go back--
두 번 째 후보군: Now we just have to go back…

첫 번 째 후보군: I’m going to use a large-scale spell!
두 번 째 후보군: I'm going to use a large-scale spell!
It’s dangerous, so hurry and go!
It got this close so quickly?

첫 번 째 후보군: I’ve never seen darkness like this before…
두 번 째 후보군: I've never seen darkness like this before...

첫 번 째 후보군: it feels like a boulder is crushing my heart.
두 번 째 후보군: It feels like a boulder is crushing my heart.
I feel like I'm losing consciousness…

첫 번 째 후보군: is this the “something” eunice was talking about?
두 번 째 후보군: Is this the "something" Eunice was talking about?

첫 번 째 후보군: your highness, it’s dangerous. please wait inside.
두 번 째 후보군: Your Highness, it is dangerous. Please wait inside.
